thread.section_title: The Hartford Gold Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Hartford Gold Group | thehartfordgoldgroup.com
thread.title: Decarla
thread.title_full: The Hartford Gold Group reviewed by Decarla

author: Decarla
title: Decarla
text: My agent was Arthur Schwartz and I felt like he went above and beyond to help me understand the precious metals industry. He was very patient in explaining everything to me so that I could make the right decisions. I felt real comfortable and know that I can trust him with any future transactions. My experience with Arthur and Hartford Gold Group was very enjoyable. I surely recommend them.
